Events that occurred on 14 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1919 - Dutch translator Willy Wielek-Berg is born.
1936 - Author G.K. Chesterton dies.
1949 - Harry Turtledove is born.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien is composing a letter to W.R. Matthews.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Elena Jeronimides.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Bruce Charlton.
1981 - The fifteenth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
2007 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Shores of Evendim" is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Elrohir and Elladan meet the escort and bring Arwen to Edoras.
